ResourceHeader.Description:
The Inter-regional Geomagnetic Data Center of the Russian-Ukrainian 
		  INTERMAGNET segment is operated by the Geophysical Center of the Russian Academy 
		  of Sciences (GC RAS). Geomagnetic data are transmitted from observatories and 
		  stations located in Russia and Ukraine. The particular feature of the Center 
		  is the automated system for real-time recognition of artificial (anthropogenic) 
		  disturbances in incoming data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Please acknowledge: Russian-Ukrainian Geomagnetic Data Center (RUGDC) 
		  and Geophysical Center of the Russian Academy of Sciences (GC RAS)
